name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-circular-timer-component
title: circular-timer-component
shortDescription: A control that performs a countdown  and triggers a specific action after a certain amount of time passes.
longDescription: This sample features a component library with a customizable clock-like timer component. The timer control counts down a specified duration and displays the elapsed and remaining time in the form of a linear or sector gauge.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
